import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; const Home = () => { const [isTransformed, setIsTransformed] = useState(false); const { t } = useLanguage(); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('heroTitle')}

{t('heroSubtitle')}

{t('heroCta1')} {t('heroCta2')}
{/* Genesis Engine Section */}

{t('homeGenesisTitle')}

{t('homeGenesisSubtitle')}

1

{t('homeGenesisStep1Title')}

{t('homeGenesisStep1Desc')}

2

{t('homeGenesisStep2Title')}

{t('homeGenesisStep2Desc')}

3

{t('homeGenesisStep3Title')}

{t('homeGenesisStep3Desc')}

{/* AI Playground Section */}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundTitle')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundSubtitle')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundStart')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundSimplePhoto')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundFinal')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundStudio')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundDescription')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundDescriptionText')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundPricing')}

{t('homeAiPlaygroundMarketPrice')}

₺4,950

{/* Final CTA Section */}

{t('homeFinalCtaTitle')}

{t('homeFinalCtaSubtitle')}

{t('homeFinalCtaButton')}
); }; export default Home;
